actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 so as to specifically provide that that remedial orders issued by the Civil Aeronautics Board in enforcement proceedings may require the repayment of charges in excess of those in lawfully filed tariffs.

summary.text: Provides that remedial orders issued by the Civil Aeronautics Board in enforcement proceedings may require the repayment of charges in excess of those in lawfully filed tariffs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 so as to specifically provide that that remedial orders issued by the Civil Aeronautics Board in enforcement proceedings may require the repayment of charges in excess of those in lawfully filed tariffs.
